head.title: Edit Signatures in {{FileFormatUp}} Documents Using {{ProgLang}} Apps
head.description: Utilize the {{ProgLang}} API to revise and manage digital signatures within {{FileFormatUp}} formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Image files.

header.title: Effortlessly Adjust Signatures in {{FileFormatUp}} with {{ProgLang}}
header.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, you can modify various electronic signatures embedded in your business documents, including PDFs, Word files, Excel sheets, presentations, and image formats.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Overview of {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) empowers you to not only add signatures but also to adjust them as needed. Whether you're working with PDFs, Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, or presentations, {{ProdFullName}} offers seamless control over signature management, making future modifications simple and intuitive.

formats.title: Edit Signatures Across Multiple File Formats
formats.description: With {{EnvName}} API, signed documents can be revisited at any time, allowing you to extract and modify signature properties for popular business formats, ensuring complete flexibility and control.

more_features.title: Signature Management for Documents
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} offers a robust suite of tools for adding, modifying, verifying, searching, and deleting signatures across a wide array of document formats, enhancing your workflow and document security.

feature_1.title: Flexible Document Signing
feature_1.content: Sign your documents with a variety of options—text, images, barcodes, and stamps—at any location in your files. You can also adjust embedded metadata like EXIF data in images and protect sensitive information using digital certificates.

feature_2.title: Verify and Search Signatures
feature_2.content: Ensure the integrity of your documents by verifying signatures with ease. Use built-in search functionality to locate and manage all signatures within a file, ensuring nothing is overlooked.

feature_3.title: Update Existing Signatures
feature_3.content: When a signature needs adjustments, whether in appearance, position, or content, our API makes the process smooth and hassle-free, letting you fine-tune any signature quickly.

feature_4.title: Remove Unwanted Signatures
feature_4.content: Whether you need to remove an outdated signature or clean up your document, {{ProdFullName}} offers full control over signature deletion, ensuring your files remain up-to-date and accurate.
